Sentencas: High energy efficiency SOFCs generators can be adopted for local and distributed micro-generation systems to promote the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions with their high fuel flexibility, long-term stability also at partial load and low noise.
Titulo: Biogas cleaning: Trace compounds removal with model validation

Sentencas: One of the main drawbacks for such generators, fed by biogenous gas is the impact of trace compounds on the anode compartment.
Titulo: Biogas cleaning: Trace compounds removal with model validation

Sentencas: For this reason, a gas clean-up section is mandatory.
Titulo: Biogas cleaning: Trace compounds removal with model validation

Sentencas: The effect of temperature and gas moisture was investigated through experiments on the removal performance of the tested sorbents.
Titulo: Biogas cleaning: Trace compounds removal with model validation

Sentencas: An increase in the operating temperature caused lower values of the maximum capacity of the adsorbent.
Titulo: Biogas cleaning: Trace compounds removal with model validation

Sentencas: The decrease of removal performance considering a humidified gas is connected to the interference of water in the pores of activated carbons.
Titulo: Biogas cleaning: Trace compounds removal with model validation

Sentencas: Biochar, compared to the other commercial sorbent materials showed the lowest removal performance, even if with activated biochar the adsorption capacity growth to commercially available materials.
Titulo: Biogas cleaning: Trace compounds removal with model validation

Sentencas: The highest adsorption capacity at 1% of the initial concentration was showed by commercial carbons with 1.75 mg/g for H2S and 20.4 mg/g for HCl.
Titulo: Biogas cleaning: Trace compounds removal with model validation

Sentencas: Experimental data were employed in a porous particle diffusion model to estimate the breakthrough time.
